column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat is not for picky eaters.  My friend wanted a more plain dish than what was offered on the menu and asked for plain French Toast.  We thought the waitress was joking when she said
column3: but she was serious.  Another friend was able to order plain egg whites and a side of grits, so there is some room for simplicity, but not very much.  However, *I* came to Little Goat to eat the often raved-about food from the menu and loved it!
